Name: Resting State fMRI study of non bothersome tinnitus
ReferencesAndLinks: Agnès Job, Anne Kavounoudias, Chloé Jaroszynski, Assia Jaillard, Chantal Delon-Martin (2019). Specific connectivity with Operculum 3 (OP3) brain region in acoustic trauma tinnitus: a seed-based resting state fMRI study. bioRxiv 676429; doi: https://doi.org/10.1101/676429

Agnès Job, Chloé Jaroszynski, Anne Kavounoudias, Assia Jaillard, Chantal Delon-Martin, (2020). Functional connectivity in chronic non-bothersome tinnitus following acoustic trauma: a seed-based resting state fMRI study. Brain Connectivity, in press
